# [Interview #1152: Calamity-Seattle, Entry #36](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1152#36)

#### Question

So burning prayers, is that so certain Shard’s can hear what’s being said?

#### Brandon Sanderson

I’ll leave that one vague for now.
